Operations / Administrative Assistant Job at Maxitech Global Investment Limited




        
    

        
        Maxitech Global Investment Limited is a Nigerian ICT distributor established in 2011, offering innovative IT solutions including hardware sales, system integration, and broadband services to enterprises across Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations / Administrative Assistant
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description

	Maxitech Global Investment Limited is seeking a reliable and proactive Operations / Admin Assistant to join our team.
	This role is ideal for someone who is physically fit, organized, and ready to support daily administrative and operational tasks.


Responsibilities


	Provide general administrative and operational support across departments.
	Assist with receiving, moving, and organizing stock or equipment.
	Handle errands and deliveries as needed.
	Support the procurement and inventory teams in day-to-day operations.
	Ensure timely execution of assigned duties.


Requirements


	Minimum of SSCE / OND qualification.
	Prior experience in an administrative or operations support role is an advantage.
	Must be male (role requires lifting and moving of objects).
	Must be young and in his early twenties.
	Must be physically fit and able to lift items when necessary.
	Must live within Ikeja and its environs.
	Strong sense of responsibility and attention to detail.
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.
	Must reside within or close to Ikeja and be punctual and reliable.


Salary
N70,000 – N90,000 / Month

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: victor.alofe@maxitechglobal.com using "Operations / Administrative Assistant Application" as the subject of the email.

In addition, our 24-hour availability onsite and online in all our branches has equally ensured our clients can rely on us for immediate service at any hour of the day.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative

Job Location: Lekki / Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Working Hours: Shift-based, including weekends and public holidays.

Job Overview


	We are seeking an experienced and customer-focused Customer Service Representative to join our retail team.
	The ideal candidate will have prior experience in a retail environment and will be responsible for ensuring customers have a positive shopping experience by providing prompt assistance, resolving issues, and maintaining excellent service standards.
	The role requires strong communication skills, patience, and professionalism in handling customer inquiries both in-person and over the phone.


Key Responsibilities


	Greet customers warmly and ensure they feel welcome.
	Attend to customer inquiries, complaints, and requests promptly and professionally.
	Provide accurate information on products, prices, and promotions.
	Handle returns, exchanges, and refunds in accordance with company policy.
	Maintain records of customer interactions and transactions.
	Communicate effectively with other departments (sales, cashier, store operations) to resolve issues.
	Ensure the customer service area is tidy, organized, and presentable at all times.
	Assist in upselling or cross-selling products when necessary.
	Monitor customer satisfaction and provide feedback to management.
	Support store operations as needed during peak hours.


Qualifications and Requirements


	Minimum of OND / HND / B.Sc Degree in any related field.
	Minimum of 1 - 3 years of experience in a retail or supermarket customer service role.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution abilities.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office tools and POS systems.
	Friendly, patient, and approachable personality.
	Must be able to multitask and work under pressure.
	Must reside within or around Lekki / Victoria Island.


Salary
Attractive and competitive, based on experience.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: hrmopheth@gmail.com using Customer Service Representative – Retail” as the subject of the mail.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Sales Agent",
  "description": "Foodonline Limited is a dynamic and fast-growing company revolutionizing the food distribution and e-commerce space. We connect consumers, restaurants, and retailers with high-quality food products through a seamless online platform. Our mission is to make food sourcing smarter, faster, and more accessible.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Agent

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)

Role Overview


	As a Sales Agent at Foodonline Limited, you will be the frontline ambassador of our brand.
	Your primary responsibility is to drive revenue growth by acquiring new customers, nurturing existing relationships, and promoting our products and services.
	You&rsquo;ll play a key role in expanding our market presence and ensuring customer satisfaction.

        Brilliant Performance Solutions Limited - Our client is an International Brand in the Hospitality Industry and operates top-notch Hotels within the mainland areas of Lagos State.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales and Marketing Manager

Job Location: Mainland, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Our client urgently requires the services of an experienced Sales Manager who has a minimum of 5 years’ experience in the sales and marketing activities in the hospitality business.
	This person must have also had a minimum of two years of marketing experience with a top-branded Hotel.
	It is part of the requirement that this person must have a degree in any relevant field and good knowledge of hotel operational software


Overview


	The Sales & Marketing Manager will be primarily responsible for executing the sales strategy of the hotel with the ultimate objective of maximizing revenues across all revenue-generating outlets to include bedrooms, meetings and events, and food and beverage.


Key Duties & Responsibilities


	Devise and implement the overall sales and marketing plan for the hotel and actively monitor its
	progress in terms of achieving KPI’s, budgets and revenues.
	Liaise with the General Manager and Great National Head Office in adopting price strategies across the hotel.
	Build-on and develop relationships with our current clients.
	Analyse current markets and identify new markets and potential clients.
	Tour series contracting.
	Organise and conduct site inspections and familiarization trips in conjunction with the Hotel team.
	Manage the number and performance of third-party and promotional websites and liaise with
	providers to ensure optimisation of the hotel’s online position.
	Proactively monitor the Hotel’s profile on the various social media platforms and ensure
	Appropriate responses are posted in a timely fashion.
	Liaise with our Digital Team in managing the content of the Hotel’s website.
	Develop and agree departmental sales plans and communicate them clearly to all parties.
	Manage all promotional collateral from copyright through to design and print and ensure that it is in line with Great National branding.
	Ensure in-house promotional material is current, effective and supports any new sales and marketing promotions.
	Where necessary devise adverts for the promotion of the Food & Beverage departments in the
	local market.
	Manage the guest database and ensure that clients’ details are accurate and up-to-date
	Ensure that all client correspondence is tracked and recorded, including quotations and contracts.
	Represent the hotel at consumer trade fairs, mall promotions and tourism events both at the local and national levels.
	Organise on and off-site client entertainment.
	Maintain the highest standards of professional conduct at all times when dealing with clients, guest,s etc.
	Submit weekly Sales & Marketing activity reports to the General Manager and Directors.
